code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'../css/RoadmapTab.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function RoadmapTab(_ref){let{onClose}=_ref;const[roadmap,setRoadmap]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{fetch('/roadmap.json?ts='+Date.now()).then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>{setRoadmap(Array.isArray(data)?data:[]);setLoading(false);}).catch(()=>setLoading(false));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"roadmap-section card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"roadmap-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Project Roadmap"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"roadmap-close-btn",onClick:onClose,children:"Close"})]}),loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"roadmap-loading",children:"Loading roadmap..."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"roadmap-list",children:roadmap.map((item,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:`roadmap-item roadmap-status-${item.status}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"roadmap-title-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"roadmap-title",children:item.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:`roadmap-status roadmap-status-${item.status}`,children:{completed:'‚úÖ Completed','in-progress':'üõ†Ô∏è In Progress',planned:'üóìÔ∏è Planned'}[item.status]||item.status})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"roadmap-desc",children:item.description})]},idx))})]});}
